case.title: Uber + Quasi - 36 (manhattan)
case.text:
Uber-smart and witty Uber-single Uber-kind and considerate
Quasi-fit (not really into super muscular, just someone who exercises regularly, and spends time developing his mind as well.... btw i'm slim and work out) Quasi-tall (5'9" and over is fine, since I'm around 5'6') Quasi-modo (hope not!)
No offense, but just know I'm attracted to Caucasian men on the professional side around the same age or slightly older.
